short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Anycom allows you to comment anything on the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AnyCom is allows you to discuss web content with your friends from facebook.

AnyCom supports the following features

- Write comments about any web page you find online, that only your friends will see
- Optionally publish these comments automatically to facebook
- Show your opinion about things by just liking or disliking pages
- See the most recent comments your friends made

AnyCom requires your friendlist to make your comments only visible to your friends and to show you only the comments made by your friends.
